description: All 20 of the CD20 assets were positive on the week, with fourteen posting returns greater than 10%.

title: Grayscale GBTC Selling Accelerates but Bitcoin ETF Inflows Remain Positive, Led by BlackRock
description: Outflows from Grayscale's bitcoin fund GBTC spiked Thursday, but inflows into U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs remained positive, led by another strong day for BlackRock's ETF.

title: Scientists use Wi-Fi signals to track human movement for the metaverse
description:
Wi-Fi sensing makes it possible to track movement in the dark and through walls.

A team of researchers from Nanyang Technological University in Singapore recently unveiled a new method for tracking human movement for the metaverse. 

One of the key features of the metaverse is the ability to represent real world objects and people in the digital world in real time. In virtual reality, for example, users can turn their heads to change their viewpoints or manipulate physical controllers in the real world to affect the digital environment.

The status quo for capturing human activity in the metaverse uses device-based sensors, cameras, or a combination of both. However, as the researchers write in their preprint research paper, both of these modalities have immediate limitations.

Read more

title: BIS issues recommendations for global stablecoin regulation

title: Bitcoin options surge to $500m as whales apply cautious strategies

title: Blockchain Association Urges Court to Dismiss SEC-Kraken Lawsuit
description:
The Blockchain Association, a non-profit organization functioning as a collective voice in the crypto space, recently filed an amicus brief in support of Kraken in the SEC lawsuit. Addressing the legal case’s impact on the entire crypto sphere, the association questioned the Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) autocratic authority. In November 2023, the SEC filed […]
